message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. Let's see what you think.
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a more reasonable split. This offer won't last forever.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still the one who needs to get more.  Let's split it 60/40.
Time is running out Alice, and the value is depreciating. I'm offering a 55/45 split. Let's be sensible and close this deal.
